description: At Chas Academy, I am immersed in the world of Fullstack JavaScript, honing my skills in modern web development. Over the course of two years, I am gaining hands-on experience in agile projects, mastering JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue, Reac, Node, Express and many more technologies. This journey is not just about coding — it's about collaboration, continuous learning, and building solutions that make a difference.

Studying International Migration and Ethnic Relations at Malmö University deepened my understanding of global migration, diversity, and social cohesion. Through research on asylum law, discrimination, and integration, I developed analytical skills that help me see challenges from multiple perspectives. My thesis explored media representations of Frontex, reflecting my passion for critical thinking and meaningful discussions.
